entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetRuntimeDirectory for WindowsDesktop apps #91182
  • Rfc2898DeriveBytes.Pbkdf2 is trimming unfriendly #91181
    9.0.0
  • ServiceProviderEngineScope captures the same object twice into a list of disposables #91179
  • LoggerMessageGenerator optimizations #91178
  • Assertion failed '!varTypeIsSIMD(vns->TypeOfVN(argVN))' during 'Do value numbering' #91175
  • Assertion failed '!varTypeIsUnsigned(type) || varTypeIsSmall(type)' during 'Generate code' #91174
  • Assertion failed 'node->IsUnusedValue() && "found an unmarked unused value"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #91173
  • Assertion failed '!childNode->isContainableHWIntrinsic()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #91170
  • BigInteger unsigned right shift operation is poorly designed and exposes implementation details #91169
  • What are the minimum required files to deploy a Mono 6 console app on macOS? #91167
  • Should Thread.Priority set nice on Linux? #91165

Closed

  • SignedCms.CheckSignature fails on ECDSA signatures signed by Win32 #91168
  • Can't run blazor hosted wasm when BlazorWebAssembly project's has private tags for references #86942
    Future
  • [Browser WASM] Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error NU1102 Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.browser-wasm with version (= 7.0.9) - Found 47 version(s) in nuget.org [ Nearest version: 8.0.0-preview.1.23110.8 ] - Found 0 version(s) in Microsoft Visual Studio Offline Packages - Found 0 version(s) in #88898
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Support Windows based ECDSA SignedCms #91183
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Update binder gen emitted-interceptor nullability to match framework impl #91180
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Remove some unused headers and functions #91177
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use AVX512 to zero locals #91166
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512

Merged

  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 116.0.5845.110, windows: 116.0.5845.111 #91164
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: add ability to pad profile counters and adjust scalable count th… #91081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Remove ThunkPool crst. #88778
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • [release/8.0] [mono] Handle enum return type when inlining CreateInstance #91061
    Servicing-consider, blocked, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix MarshalStructAsLayoutSeq #90719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Emit armv8.4 ldapur* for volatile loads with contained offsets #89681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Make handling of DefaultCredentials in NegotiateAuthentication/SocketsHttpHandler more consistent #91138
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Make handling of DefaultCredentials in NegotiateAuthentication/SocketsHttpHandler more consistent (alternative version) #91160
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Activate Quic Alpn Narrowing Test #91116
    area-System.Net.Quic
